item.title: CVE-2022-21761|2024-08-03T02:53:36.151Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6853%2C%20mt6853t%2C%20mt6873%2C%20mt6875%2C%20mt6877%2C%20mt6883%2C%20mt6885%2C%20mt6889%2C%20mt6891%2C%20mt6893%2C%20mt9636%2C%20mt9638%2C%20mt9666
item.description: In apusys driver, there is a possible system crash due to an integer overflow. This could lead to local denial of service with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS06479532; Issue ID: ALPS06479532.
